page.title: 13Minister At Birnie Church.
page.content: Mr Torrie has lived in Birnie for 29 years . At first there was a bus that went round the Parish every Sunday to bring people to church. By 1958 most people had cars and the bus was not used any more. Mr Torrie has a wife,3 daughters and 2 sons. He has 2 dogs and 3 ponies .He travels on average 30 miles a day and six to ten thousand miles per year.On Sundays he takes a service in Pluscarden at 10.30 and in Birnie at 11.45. He visits four schools a week. His last charge was on the Rock of Gibraltar.His hobbies are sailing a dinghy,chess,music and playing music. Birnie has been a church since before 1190 and he sees it going on for ever.He would like to see more young people going to church.
